attributes.action: Allow Ghurkhas (and family) that have served in the British Army to become BRITISH citizens
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ghurkhas that have served in the British Army at any time should be allowed to become British citizens. They have paid a service to this country over immigrants being allowed into this country and being given free hand outs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
